description.narrative: This activity (Management costs for school construction) is a component of Punjab Education Support Programme II reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £17,983,397. This component benefits Pakistan, and works in the following sector(s): Primary education, Higher education. , with the following implementing partners: Cardno Emerging Markets, DAI Europe, IMC Worldwide. The start date is 26-04-2016 and the end date is 31-03-2022.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
